# UINavigationItem.SearchBarPlacement.stacked

**Case**

A constant that stacks the search bar vertically below the other content in the navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
case stacked
```

## Discussion

This value reflects the traditional search bar layout available in versions of iOS earlier than iOS 16.

## Constants

- **UINavigationItem.SearchBarPlacement.automatic**: A constant that places the search bar according to the current layout.
- **inline**: A constant that places the search bar on the trailing edge of the navigation bar, inline with the other content.
